channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Missing bollards outside 25 Old Cheltenham Road. Meaning cars park illegally to go to Tescos, 2nd July
item.description:
Outside 25/27 Old Cheltenham Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 131, Old Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive cctv camera that can look straight into my apartment?!, 2nd July
item.description:
I have recently returned from holiday and noticed that a camera has been put up on a lamppost, directly outside my apartment window. It appears that the camera can see into my apartment - which breaks all sorts of laws. I am unsure what the purpose of this camera is, nevertheless, its location is clearly inappropriate and must be moved. The camera is located opposite the John Lewis deliveries entrance on Albion Street. See photos attached I am requesting that this camera is removed IMMEDIATELY

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Place, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Potholes that keep recurring, 2nd July
item.description:
The Cottage Gretton There are a number of potholes in this location outside my holiday let. These cause noise and they are affecting my business. They keep getting filled but they donâ€™t last. This needs to be properly repaired rather than filled and it needs to be dealt with quickly because I am getting complaints from guests whose sleep is affected by the noise.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Gretton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This is a sunkeb/broken water manhole cover!, 2nd July
item.description:
I reported this problem in February 2024 and the complaint was acknowledged and a white ring was painted around the problem with the number 581 written on it! No further action has been taken and it is getting worse!!! This os outside number 66 / GL51 0PD
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Henley Road, Springbank, Cheltenham

item.title: The sign is illegible problem, 2nd July
item.description:
A resident phoned concerned that this circus sign had caused an obstruction when she was driving. She was surprised by a pedestrian she could not see crossing from the pavement onto the pedestrian crossing. The sign has now been removed. - see thread attached
Report on FixMyStreet
